TopicTitle: How do I output text to the GUI a la "Target: XXX" and "Timewarp: 1x" etc

Articles.Content: At various times the game outputs yellow-green text in the center top of the window. I'm wondering if there's an easy way to output text to this area, so I won't have to build something from scratch?

Hello, I think you looking for:

    ScreenMessages.PostScreenMessage ("message", int_duration, ScreenMessageStyle.where_you_want_it);
